QueryViewSpec.Name: Payments Applied Query
QueryViewSpec.Description: Displays how batch payments are being applied.
QueryViewSpec.Author: Mark Sellers

ViewImplementation.ViewSQL: -- SQL from Jeff for payment batches and applied funds: --create index IX_JAM_BR_DATE on BATCHREVENUE (DATE) select br.ID, br.DATE, BATCHNUMBER, c.LOOKUPID, br.AMOUNT, bra.APPLIED, ft.TRANSACTIONAMOUNT, rs.[STATUS], rs.FREQUENCY, rs.NEXTTRANSACTIONDATE, d.USERID, d.NAME from BATCHREVENUE br join BATCHREVENUEAPPLICATION bra on br.ID = bra.BATCHREVENUEID join BATCH b on b.ID = br.BATCHID join CONSTITUENT c on c.ID = br.CONSTITUENTID join FINANCIALTRANSACTION ft on ft.ID = bra.REVENUEID -- actually the recurring gift, not this payment join FINANCIALTRANSACTIONLINEITEM ftli on ftli.financialtransactionid = ft.id join dbo.REVENUESPLIT_EXT rse on ftli.ID = rse.ID join DESIGNATION d on d.ID = rse.DESIGNATIONID join REVENUESCHEDULE rs on rs.ID = ft.ID where ft.TRANSACTIONAMOUNT <> bra.APPLIED --order by br.date desc
